downloadAppBanner.headline: Get the Bridebook app
pushNotificationsOptInModal.bbLiteDescri: We'll notify you about staying organised and special offers.
pushNotificationsOptInModal.bbLiteTitle: Get updates on your planning progress
pushNotificationsOptInModal.description: Top suppliers get snapped up fast. Keep your notifications on to respond quickly to new messages and view the latest special offers.
pushNotificationsOptInModal.title: Get real-time responses from suppliers
pushNotificationsOptInModal.variantDescr: We’ll share expert advice based on your wedding timeline.
Get gentle nudges to keep your spending in check and manage your payments.
We’ll notify you the moment the supplier you messaged gets back to you.
Get updates about your planning journey and never miss a reply from suppliers.
Get helpful nudges based on where you are in your wedding journey.
Get notified the moment a venue or supplier replies to you.
Get updates on your shortlisted suppliers and booking tips.
Get timely reminders to stay on track with all your planning tasks and milestones.
